text: Gerrit Abrahamszoon de Vries (22 February 1818 – 4 March 1900) was a Dutch jurist and politician who served as Prime Minister of the Netherlands from 4 June 1872 to 27 August 1874. ==References== *Biography in Elsevier, 21 April 2009 (in Dutch). Category:1818 births Category:1900 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of the Netherlands Category:Ministers of Justice of the Netherlands Category:Dutch jurists Category:Dutch Mennonites Category:People from Haarlem Category:Leiden University alumni
title: Gerrit de Vries (politician)
